TaskDescription.Detail: Open a new Excel file, input data, filter, and sort.

Assist.value: You can designate a variable to contain the opened Excel file. Store in RESULT by default.
Specifies whether to make the Excel document visible on the screen when opening it. When activated, the Excel file becomes invisible.
Input a value in the area specified in the Excel file.
Specify the values ​​to be input as an array. Input this.data. (The variable is assigned a value to be input.)
Input the cell address to start typing. Values ​​are Input from 'A1'.
Sets the style of the area specified in the Excel document. Let's set the background color of cells with Yellow value to yellow.
Specifies the target range. Input 'B5', the range of the yellow cell.
Input '255,255,0' to set the background color to yellow.
Sort the Excel data. Let's sort by Age in descending order.
Specifies the sort criteria. Input 'C2:C5' to reference Age.
Specifies the range to be sorted. Input 'A2:C5'.
Set the sort method. Select DESC to specify descending order.
Specify a filter in the Excel document. Let's set the filter with Age value between 30 and 35.
Input the location of the cell with the filter. Input 'C1' to set the filter on Age.
Input a search condition. Input '>=30' to set a filter with Age above 30.
Input additional search criteria. Input '<=35' to set a filter with Age under 35.
Select the operation method between FilterQuery. Please enable it to specify AND conditions.
Specify a filter using font or color in the Excel document. Let's set up a filter whose background color for the Name value is yellow.
Input the location of the cell with the filter. In Name, Input 'B1' to set the filter.
Specifies whether the filter target is a cell or a font. Disable it to target the background color.
Sets whether to use no fill. Disable it to specify the fill color.
Specifies the color to filter. Input '255,255,0' to specify a yellow filter.
Specifies the path to save the file. Input Global.ProjectDir + 'test.xlsx' to save to the current project path.
Close the Excel document opened in the background.
Specifies whether to force quit. Please enable it to force quit.
